description.text: All chaotic evil, chaotic good, lawful evil, and lawful good creatures within the area of this spell suffer the following conditions, based on their Hit Dice. Hit Dice Effect Equal to caster level Sickened Up to caster level - 1 Sickened, staggered Up to caster level - 5 Nauseated, sickened, staggered Up to caster level - 10 Killed, nauseated, sickened, staggered The effects are concurrent. A creature can attempt a Will save to reduce or negate the effects. If subject to multiple effects, the creature rolls once and applies the result to each effect.
